name: foundry-stack
description: A modular Laravel + React baseline for internal management systems.

scripts.i:all: bun i && bun run be i && bun run fe i
scripts.dev: concurrently --handle-input --kill-others-on-fail --success=last -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74" "bun run be dev" "bun run be ql" "bun run fe dev" --names='SERVER,QUEUE,CLIENT'
scripts.dev:fe:dk: bun run --env-file ./.envs/.env.docker -- bun run fe dev
scripts.dk:artisan: bun run dk exec backend php artisan
scripts.dk:sh: bun run dk exec backend sh
scripts.pg:dev: concurrently --handle-input --kill-others-on-fail --success=last -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74" "bun run be pg:dev" "bun run be pg:ql" "bun run fe dev" --names='SERVER,QUEUE,CLIENT'
